alert.note: Alert for Fairfield; Hocking; Licking (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 23 at 12:37PM EDT by NWS Wilmington
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT PORTIONS OF CENTRAL FAIRFIELD, HOCKING AND EASTERN LICKING COUNTIES THROUGH 115 PM EDT... At 1237 PM EDT, strong thunderstorms were located along a line extending from Newark to Circleville, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 45 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Locations impacted include... Newark, Lancaster, Heath, Logan, Granville, Nelsonville, Baltimore, Buckeye Lake, Hebron, Bremen, Millersport, Pleasantville, Hanover, Hide-A-Way Hills, Marne, Fairfield Beach, Hocking Hills State Park, Harbor Hills, Thornport and Starr. This includes I-70 in Ohio between mile markers 125 and 142, and near mile marker 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...45 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a sturdy building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 200 PM EDT for central Ohio. To report hazardous weather conditions, go to our website at weather.gov/iln and submit your report via social media, when you can do so safely.
